name: Custom Preloader in wordpress
author: Md Sohel

sections.description: You can select Custome Preloader style, color & others by using the options of this plugin. In this documentation, we’ll cover enough areas of the option panel for you to control the plugin effectively. Lets began: If you have any question(s) or problem(s) that is/are beyond the scope of this help file, please go to email contact form here. Thank you so much!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/custom-preloader directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress Custom Preloader screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Custom Preloader’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Preloader Settings screen to configure the plugin

short_description: This is Our Custom Preloader plugin in wordpress. Custom Preloader in wordpress is a jQuery Custome Preloader plugin for wordpress.
